p: In a round conical flask added 5 g of monoica Forssk powder with 100 ml of absolute ethanol 99% and mixed well then left for 20-30 min inside microwave-assisted extraction homemade instrument (Daewoo company, S. Korea), and started the extraction process under conditions of 1 min and 50 ºC, as shown in ( Figure 1(a)). The ethanol extract was cooled for 10-20 min and centrifuged with 15 min and 3000 rbm and then filtered by whatman filter paper 20 µm and kept at 4 ºC.
